notes:
Upon defeating [[Bakragore]] for the first time, players have an increased chance to drop a [[Bag You Covet]]. This chance will keep on increasing further with every kill until they loot a bag from him. Then, the drop chance returns to its original value which is considerably lower than the increased first-kill chance. Each time they subsequently defeat him without receiving a bag, the chances increase again untill their next drop.

Bakragore has four progenies, two pairs of twins which were split from him: [[Murcion]] & [[Ichgahal]], and [[Chagorz]] & [[Vemiath]].
name: Bakragore
